General.Name: Goldiam International Limited
General.Description: Goldiam International Limited engages in the manufacture and sale of diamond studded gold and silver jewelry in India. The company operates in two segments, Jewellery Manufacturing Activity and Investment Activity. Its products include engagement rings, wedding bands, anniversary rings, bridal sets, earrings, pendants, and necklaces. The company also exports its products to the United States, Europe, and internationally. Goldiam International Limited was incorporated in 1986 and is based in Mumbai, India.

5.Name: Mr. Milan R. Mehta
5.Title: Managing Director of Diagold Designs Ltd
